casebody.data:
No. 482, No. 541,

October Term, 1962.

October Term, 1962.

Local No 207, International Association of Bridge, Structural and Ornamental Iron Workers Union, et al. v. Perko, Local 100, United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices, v. Borden,

373 U. S. 701; and

373 U. S. 690. Petitions for rehearing denied.

Mr. Justice Goldberg took no part in the consideration or decision of these petitions.
